infobox.Japanese title:: 夢みる乙女の迷推理  (Yumemiru Otome no Meisuiri?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo (supervisor)  Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Michitaka Yamamoto  Ryuta Imaizumi  Juri Saito
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Aoi Yuuki as Funako Nakai  Ryuzou Ishino as Akio Nashida  Keigo Manaka as Takashi Kiyose  Kazuyuki Okitsu as Kazuma Hikone

sections.Situation:
A girl named Funako Nakai came to Mouri Detective Agency asking for help to search someone named Kazuma Hikone, but Kogoro refused to help. Funako Nakai then came to Kazuma's house to find him and Conan followed her. Conan asked Kazuma's neighbor, Takashi Kiyose if he noticed something strange about Kazuma and at the same time, another neighbor named Akio Nashida suddenly burst out after hearing noise and claimed that he didn't know. When Conan got back to the house, he felt that someone is watching them and asked Funako if the notebook was the reason why she couldn't go to the police. Funako then gave the notebook to  Conan and he immediately read what was inside the notebook. It was titled "Crime Plan", containing an article about how to rob a particular place.

Later, Ishigama Jewelry is robbed. Conan then go to the crime scene and meet Takagi.

The robbery method turns out to be the same as what was written on the notebook. Can Conan figure out where is Kazuma? And if he really robbed the bank?
